trans-unit.source: Represents a connector between two activity designers on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Representa um conector entre dois designers de atividade em uma superfície de design do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A connector is the line that appears on a workflow design surface that connects one activity designer to another.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Um conector é a linha que aparece em uma superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho que se conecta a um designer de atividade para outra.

trans-unit.source: Connector provides methods and properties that allow you to customize how to draw a set of connectors when an activity designer is rendered at design time.
trans-unit.target: Conector fornece métodos e propriedades que permitem que você personalize como desenhar um conjunto de conectores quando um designer de atividade é renderizado em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> where drawing for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> begins.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> onde desenhar para a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref> começa.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> where drawing for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> ends.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> onde desenhar para a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref> termina.

trans-unit.source: source or target contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: sourceou target contém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> that accessibility applications use to adjust the application UI for users who have impairments.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> que aplicativos de acessibilidade usam para ajustar o interface do usuário do aplicativo para usuários com deficiências.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> that accessibility applications use to adjust the application UI for users who have impairments.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> que aplicativos de acessibilidade usam para ajustar o interface do usuário do aplicativo para usuários com deficiências.

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounding rectangle for the connector on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o retângulo delimitador para o conector na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that bounds the connector on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que circunda o conector na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> is modified.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref> é modificado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the connector is modified; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o conector for modificado; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only collection of points that contains all segments found in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de pontos de somente leitura que contém todos os segmentos encontrada no <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> read-only collection that contains all segments found in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> coleção somente leitura que contém todos os segmentos encontrada no <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> is equal to the specified connector.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o atual <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref> é igual ao conector especificado.

trans-unit.source: Equals verifies that both the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.Source%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.Target%2A> properties of the two connectors hold references to the same <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> objects.
trans-unit.target: Igual a verifica que tanto o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.Source%2A>e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.Target%2A>Propriedades dois conectores possuem referências para o mesmo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint>objetos.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.Target%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> to compare with the current connector.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref> para comparar com o conector atual.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified connector is equal to the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o conector especificado é igual ao atual <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns an empty array of Rectangle object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma matriz vazia de objeto do retângulo.

trans-unit.source: Derived classes populate this collection.
trans-unit.target: Classes derivadas preencher essa coleção.

trans-unit.source: A generic collection of Rectangle objects.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção genérica de objetos do retângulo.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o código hash para a atual <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um código hash para a atual <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a service object of the specified type if it is available.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um objeto de serviço do tipo especificado se ele estiver disponível.

trans-unit.source: GetService returns the service object available through <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.ParentDesigner%2A>.
trans-unit.target: GetService retorna o objeto de serviço disponível por meio de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.ParentDesigner%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.ParentDesigner%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the service object to return.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>do objeto de serviço para retornar.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A service object of type serviceType or a null reference ( in Visual Basic) if there is no service object of type serviceType.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto de serviço do tipo serviceType ou uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic) se não houver nenhum objeto de serviço do tipo serviceType .

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified point resides on the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se o ponto especificado reside no atual <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Typically, HitTest indicates whether a user has clicked a point on a connector displayed on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, HitTest indica se um usuário clicou um ponto em um conector exibido em uma superfície de design do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> to test.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> para testar.

trans-unit.source: if point resides on the current ; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if point resides on the current ; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> and causes it to be redrawn.
trans-unit.target: Invalida o atual <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref> e faz com que ele seja redesenhado.

trans-unit.source: Invalidate causes all contents found in <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.Bounds%2A> to be included in the update region for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.ParentDesigner%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Invalidar faz com que todo o conteúdo encontrado no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.Bounds%2A>devem ser incluídos na região de atualização para <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.ParentDesigner%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.ParentDesigner%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: Changes the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> height and width using the settings defined in the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Alterações de <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref> altura e largura usando as configurações definidas do <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that contains the height and width settings to offset the connector.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que contém as configurações de altura e largura para deslocar o conector.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> that layout operations are occurring.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref> que operações de layout estão ocorrendo.

trans-unit.source: OnLayout clears <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.ConnectorSegments%2A> and repopulates it with a new range of points.
trans-unit.target: Limpa OnLayout <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.ConnectorSegments%2A>e preenche-o com um novo intervalo de pontos.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.ConnectorSegments%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: Renders the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Renderiza o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref> na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the drawing data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados de desenho.

trans-unit.source: Used for drawing the Connector when it is dragged from one state to another.
trans-unit.target: Usado para desenhar o conector quando ele é arrastado de um estado para outro.

trans-unit.source: This method is called when a user is creating a connector, moving a middle point or moving an endpoint from one activity to another.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é chamado quando um usuário está criando um conector, mover um ponto intermediário ou mover um ponto de extremidade de uma atividade para outra.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"></xref> object that specifies the graphics to use to draw the object and the clipping rectangle in which to draw it.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"> </xref> objeto que especifica os elementos gráficos para usar para desenhar o objeto e o retângulo de recorte no qual desenhar a ele.

trans-unit.source: Coordinates for the segments in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Coordenadas de segmentos no <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Coordinated for the edit points on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Coordenada para os pontos de edição no <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Used for drawing a Connector that is selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: Usado para desenhar um conector selecionado pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"></xref> object that specifies the graphics to use to draw the object and the clipping rectangle in which to draw it.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"> </xref> objeto que especifica os elementos gráficos para usar para desenhar o objeto e o retângulo de recorte no qual desenhar a ele.

trans-unit.source: Not used.
trans-unit.target: Não usado.

trans-unit.source: Coordinates for the edit points on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Coordena para editar pontos no <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer on which the connecter appears on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o designer em que o conector aparece na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> on which the connector appears on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> em que o conector aparece na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Gets the workflow view associated with the connector.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o modo de exibição do fluxo de trabalho associado com o conector.

trans-unit.source: ParentView provides access to the workflow design surface on which the connector appears.
trans-unit.target: ParentView fornece acesso à superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho no qual o conector apareça.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref> that is associated with the connector.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref> que está associado com o conector.

trans-unit.source: Performs layout tasks for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Executa tarefas de layout para o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: PerformLayout calls the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.PerformLayout%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method and specifies that the layout update does not need to occur immediately.
trans-unit.target: Chamadas de PerformLayout a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.PerformLayout%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método e especifica que a atualização de layout não precisa ocorrer imediatamente.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.PerformLayout%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Reroutes the connector from source to target if the connector has changed.
trans-unit.target: Redireciona o conector de origem para destino se o conector foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> collection that represents the new connector segments to use for rerouting.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> coleção que representa os novos segmentos de conector para usar para redirecionamento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> where drawing of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> begins.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> onde o desenho do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref> começa.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> where drawing of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> begins.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> onde o desenho do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref> começa.

trans-unit.source: When setting this property the source <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.AssociatedDesigner*> does not match the target associated designer.
trans-unit.target: Ao definir essa propriedade de origem <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.AssociatedDesigner*>não coincide com o designer de destino associado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.AssociatedDesigner*>

trans-unit.source: Source was set to a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Origem foi definida como uma referência nula (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos os recursos usados pelo <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> where drawing of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> ends.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> onde o desenho do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref> termina.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> where drawing of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> ends.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> onde o desenho do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref> termina.

trans-unit.source: When setting this property the source <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.AssociatedDesigner*> does not match the target associated designer.
trans-unit.target: Ao definir essa propriedade de origem <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.AssociatedDesigner*>não coincide com o designer de destino associado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.AssociatedDesigner*>

trans-unit.source: Target was set to a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Conjunto de destino como uma referência nula (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> no Visual Basic).
